AboutMe.title: Hi, I'm Bulut
content: After working in the corporate aviation sector for 12 years, I completed my childhood dream of studying computer programming and completely changed my career.
Now, as a full-stack developer, I continue to learn new things every day and improve my skills. By the way, my biggest source of motivation is our cat, <button>Loki :)</button>.
